mapper.select: /**ieda.deploy.config.setting.selectDirectorConfig**/ Select ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config order by default_yn desc

/**ieda.deploy.config.setting.selectDirectorConfigByDefaultYn**/ select deployment_file, ieda_director_config_seq, ieda_director_config.create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, ieda_director_config.director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, ieda_director_config.update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config join ieda_bootstrap on ieda_director_config.director_name = ieda_bootstrap.director_name and default_yn = #{defaultYn}

/**ieda.deploy.config.setting.selectDirectorConfigBySeq**/ select deployment_file, ieda_director_config_seq, ieda_director_config.create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, ieda_director_config.director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, ieda_director_config.update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config join ieda_bootstrap on ieda_director_config.director_name = ieda_bootstrap.director_name and ieda_director_config_seq=#{seq}

/**ieda.deploy.config.setting.selectDirectorConfigByDirectorUrl**/ select ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, user_id, user_password From ieda_director_config Where director_url=#{directorUrl}
mapper.insert: /**ieda.deploy.config.setting.insertDirector**/ insert into ieda_director_config ( ieda_director_config_seq, create_date, create_user_id, current_deployment, default_yn, director_cpi, director_name, director_port, director_url, director_uuid, director_version, update_date, update_user_id, user_id, user_password) Values ( #{director.iedaDirectorConfigSeq}, now(), #{director.createUserId}, #{director.currentDeployment}, #{director.defaultYn}, #{director.directorCpi}, #{director.directorName}, #{director.directorPort}, #{director.directorUrl}, #{director.directorUuid}, #{director.directorVersion}, now(), #{director.updateUserId}, #{director.userId}, #{director.userPassword})
mapper.update: /**ieda.deploy.config.setting.updateDirector**/ Update ieda_director_config Set current_deployment=#{director.currentDeployment}, default_yn=#{director.defaultYn}, director_cpi=#{director.directorCpi}, director_name=#{director.directorName}, director_port=#{director.directorPort}, director_url=#{director.directorUrl}, director_uuid=#{director.directorUuid}, director_version=#{director.directorVersion}, update_date=now(), update_user_id=#{director.updateUserId}, user_id=#{director.userId}, user_password=#{director.userPassword} Where ieda_director_config_seq= #{director.iedaDirectorConfigSeq}
mapper.select: /**ieda.deploy.config.setting.selectDirectorConfigInfoByDirectorNameAndCPI**/ Select ieda_director_config_seq ,create_date ,current_deployment ,default_yn ,director_cpi ,director_name ,director_port ,director_url ,director_uuid ,director_version ,update_date ,user_id ,user_password From ieda_director_config Where director_cpi = #{director_cpi} And director_name = #{director_name}
